attributes.action: demand the full disclosure of ALL expenses incurred by all members of parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it is the taxpayers who are ultimately footing the bill it is only right that we should know how our money is being spent. This should include monies spent on second homes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
